label: AppliedChemicalTreatment
comment: A process of applying a chemical, physical, or biological agent to an object.

datatypeProperties.comment: The name, expressed as text, of the method of this applied chemical treatment.
A name or symbol, expressed as text, of a radioactive radionuclide.
A date, time, date time, or other date time of an occurrence in this supply chain schedule.

objectProperties.comment: The specified temperature applicable for this applied chemical treatment.
A period during which this chemical treatment is applied.
A measure of the chemical concentration of this applied chemical treatment.
The authentication of the results of this applied chemical treatment.
The note describing the results of this applied chemical treatment.
A chemical used during this applied chemical treatment.

referencedBy.comment: A chemical treatment applied as required by this cross-border regulatory procedure.
